attributes.action: I want to add  being a parent of a young child/ren under the Equality act
attributes.additional_details: Having children is such a fundamental part of life. To be refused a property just because you have a child is discrimination even if not in the eyes of the current law. Children are human beings and just because someone has a child doesn't mean they are no longer a 'professional'
attributes.background: I would like Private landlords not to be able to refuse a property due to someone having a young child or even ask about children at the offer stages

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319813
